"Voyager's Delight" - A luggage tag that doubles as a portable charger, featuring a built-in solar panel for powering your phone and other electronic devices while on the go.
"Journey Journal" - A luggage tag that doubles as a travel journal, complete with prompts and space to write down your thoughts, memories, and experiences from your travels.
"Smart Luggage Tag" - A luggage tag that connects to your smartphone app, allowing you to track your luggage's location in real-time and receive notifications if it's moved or delayed.
"Eco-Friendly Luggage Tag" - A luggage tag made from sustainable materials, such as recycled paper or biodegradable plastic, to help reduce your carbon footprint while traveling.

"Language Learning Luggage Tag" - A luggage tag that doubles as a language learning tool, featuring phrases and vocabulary in the language of the destination you're traveling to, to help you communicate with locals and learn the local language.
